metadata.name: Soñando con Flores
metadata.description:
Soñando con Flores 

In January 2023, the children of ArtePro participated in a workshop at the Botanical Garden of UNAM. Artist Lucrezia de Fazio taught them how to paint using Hibiscus flowers. Surrounded by the gardens and using only flowers and water, the children experimented with this painting technique. 

This inaugural ArtePro3 release, called Soñando con Flores (Dreaming with flowers), is an AI artwork created using the paintings the children made in the workshop that day, unifying them into one shared dream. 

Soñando con Flores is part of the ArtePro3 launch presented by Jaka Labs and Operator.

Special thanks to Mattia Cuttini
